TopicTitle: how do i make a propeller?

Articles.Content:
how do i make a propeller since i make lot of propellers but they always break or they just dont fly

also download links to your invention would teach me how propeller works

it should be for alpha 25

I'd recommend using a mod that adds propeller parts to the game, as stock propellers are pretty unreliable and wonky.

That said, a propeller needs to have a slight angle of attack (and spin obviously) to produce lift.

The most complicated issue in stock KSP is the bearing that will allow it to spin. Out of curiosity, why are you asking for alpha 25 specifically?

34 minutes ago, Rocket In My Pocket said:

I'd recommend using a mod that adds propeller parts to the game, as stock propellers are pretty unreliable and wonky.

That said, a propeller needs to have a slight angle of attack (and spin obviously) to produce lift.

The most complicated issue in stock KSP is the bearing that will allow it to spin. Out of curiosity, why are you asking for alpha 25 specifically?

im like playing on alpha 25
